Since then it's been significantly growing, and we're still working a lot on promoting it. We finished 2020 with about 100 Product Managers at EPAM, and by the end of 2021 we already had 250+ team members. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The main goal of the practice is to evolve PdM competency at EPAM, promote product mindset and product-oriented approaches, and grow Product Management experience in the company. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Practice structure \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Product Management is a part of the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/orgchart/unit?unitPath=Global%20Delivery\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Global Delivery Organization\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" at EPAM structure. Product Management Practice is \\\"community\\\" driven and spread across several regions and multiple Org Units. While it's a distributed practice, there is a core team of people driving it. It's also being developed by initiative groups and the PdM community. The Practice consists of several units in different locations. The major ones are shown below, but in reality, there are many more of them.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Top
